response.overview: Growing up is hard to do for young chat-room enthusiast Mi Wei, who strikes up an online friendship with a most unlikely buddy: Cappuccino, aka Mi Wei's mom. The misunderstanding drives Mi Wei to leave home. Meanwhile, Mi Wei struggles gamely through middle school, navigating relationships with teachers and classmates. A bittersweet portrait of adolescence emerges in this moving Chinese stage drama.
response.title: The Taste of Lemon Yellow
